faqs.question: Are your electricians qualified?
faqs.answer: All our electricians are NICEIC approved, Part P certified, and fully insured with years of experience.

faqs.question: Do you provide electrical certificates?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide full certification for all work including EICR reports, Part P certificates, and building regulation compliance.

faqs.question: How much does a rewire cost?
faqs.answer: Rewiring costs vary by property size. We offer free surveys and detailed quotes before any work begins.

faqs.question: Can you install smart home systems?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in smart lighting, automated systems, and whole-home integration.
